name: In Five Colors Dyed
title: Chiori: In Five Colors Dyed
in_play_description: When your Chiori, who has this equipped, uses Fluttering Hasode: Summon 1 additional Tranquilly Taking Ten Tamoto, and Select 1 of 4 Chiori's Automaton Dolls before also summoning it.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Chiori to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Chiori, equip this card.
After Chiori equips this card, immediately use Fluttering Hasode once.
When your Chiori, who has this equipped, uses Fluttering Hasode: Summon 1 additional Tranquilly Taking Ten Tamoto, and Select 1 of 4 Chiori's Automaton Dolls before also summoning it.
(You must have Chiori in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
